name: Karaoke Night
description:
Hey Sisters! We are super super excited to bring to you, KARAOKE AT BLR BREWING CO!!! 
 
 
Details 
 
Date: 20th July, 8 pm onwards 
 
Venue: BLR Brewing Co - HSR Layout (please refer to the map link mentioned) 
 
 
Concept :  This will be Karaoke night, where you'll get to sing along to your hearts content, all while munching on yummy food and drinking delicious bevs. 
 
This ticket includes :  
 
- 2 cocktails (from a menu of 3 options) 
 
- Unlimited pass around appetisers (veg and non-veg) 
 
- Unlimited Sangrias! 
 
- Unlimited singing opportunities 
 
Join us ladies!! We're so excited to add some belting (with a mic and also dinner) to our calendar!

location.name: BLR Brewing Co
location.address:
HSR Layout
450, 1st Floor, 17th Cross Rd, Sector 4, HSR Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560102
